plot: A grief stricken young widow finds the ghost of her dead fiancé singing in her shower. Either she's hallucinating with grief or He's actually returned from the dead determined to help her move on with her life.
title: Singing in the Shower
plot_es: A grief stricken young widow finds the ghost of her dead fiancé singing in her shower. Either she's hallucinating with grief or He's actually returned from the dead determined to help her move on with her life.
plot_en: A grief stricken young widow finds the ghost of her dead fiancé singing in her shower. Either she's hallucinating with grief or He's actually returned from the dead determined to help her move on with her life.
